thread.title: Paul Pogba, brother Florentin and family have a rave in Old Trafford tunnel before heading out to Wings restaurant for dinner in Manchester
thread.title_full: Paul Pogba, brother Florentin and family have a rave in Old Trafford tunnel before heading out to Wings restaurant for dinner in Manchester

author: aterrell
title: Paul Pogba, brother Florentin and family have a rave in Old Trafford tunnel before heading out to Wings restaurant for dinner in Manchester
text:
EFL 'La Pogbance' Paul Pogba, brother Florentin and family have a rave in Old Trafford tunnel before heading out to Wings restaurant for dinner in Manchester 
Manchester United midfielder posted Instagram video of himself and family raving to 'Pogbance' at Old Trafford before heading out to famous Manchester restaurant Video
